moduleMetadataJson.name: Install Python for Windows
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module places an embeddable Python3 distribution onto the target file system,
                        granting pentesters access to a lightweight Python interpreter.
                        This module does not require administrative privileges or user interaction with
                        installation prompts.
author: Michael Long <bluesentinel@protonmail.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: Powershell::persist
options.description: Run the payload in a loop

options.name: Powershell::wrap_double_quotes
options.description: Wraps the -Command argument in single quotes

options.name: Powershell::method
options.description: Payload delivery method (Accepted: net, reflection, old, msil)

options.name: Powershell::Post::timeout
options.description: Powershell execution timeout, set < 0 to run async without termination

options.name: FILE_PATH
options.description: File path to store the python zip file; current directory by default

options.name: CLEANUP
options.description: Remove module artifacts; set to true when ready to cleanup
